traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The drow's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 18). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * At will: dancing lights * 1/day each: darkness, faerie fire, levitate (self only)

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The drow is a 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared: * Cantrips (at will): mage hand, message, poison spray, shocking grasp, ray of frost * 1st level (4 slots): burning hands, mage armor, magic missile, shield * 2nd level (3 slots): gust of wind, invisibility, misty step, shatter * 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fireball, haste * 4th level (3 slots): dimension door, Otiluke's resilient sphere * 5th level (2 slots): cone of cold * 6th level (1 slot): chain lightning

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: War Magic
traits.desc: When the drow uses its action to cast a spell, it can make one weapon attack as a bonus action.
